metadata.feature_description: Select the default landing page for group spaces from dynamically loaded group tabs.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify dropdown populates with available group tabs

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings panel opens with Group Home Page dropdown visible
steps.actual: Community Settings panel opened successfully with Miscellaneous Community Settings section visible

steps.action: Click on Group Home Page dropdown to expand it
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing 8 group tabs: Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select a group home page from dropdown

steps.action: Select 'Discussions' from the Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Discussions option should be selected in the dropdown
steps.actual: Discussions was successfully selected in the dropdown

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save group home page selection and verify persistence

steps.action: Click Save button after selecting Discussions
steps.expected: Settings should be saved with success notification

steps.action: Refresh page and navigate back to Community Settings
steps.expected: Group Home Page dropdown should show 'Discussions' as selected
steps.actual: Group Home Page dropdown reverted to 'Activity' - the saved value did not persist

issues: CRITICAL BUG: Group Home Page selection does not persist after save. The save operation shows success message but the value reverts to previous state on page refresh.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default value for Group Home Page

steps.action: Observe default value in Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Default value should be 'Activity' (representing no specific selection or first group tab)
steps.actual: Default value is 'Activity' which is displayed in the dropdown on initial load

observations: The Group Home Page dropdown correctly populates with 8 group tabs: Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki
The UI allows selecting any of the available group tabs without validation errors
Save operation appears to succeed with 'Item successfully saved' notification but the Group Home Page value does not persist to the database
Other community settings (Page Size, Profanity Filtering, Comment Moderation) also showed unexpected values after refresh, suggesting a broader persistence issue with Community Settings
Code suggests GroupHomeTabId is stored via CmxSettingsController but the value is not being properly saved or retrieved
